required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of VN-0200 in Japanese Healthy Adults and Elderly Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1 Study to Assess the Safety, Tolerability, and Immunogenicity of VN-0200 After Intramuscular Injections in Japanese Healthy Adults and Elderly Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: This study will assess the safety, tolerability, and immunogenicity of VN-0200 after intramuscular injections in Japanese healthy adults and elderly subjects.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants Reporting Treatment-emergent Adverse Events
primary_outcome.time_frame: From first administration through 28 days post second administration

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants Reporting Local and Systemic Adverse Events
primary_outcome.time_frame: From first administration up to 14 days after second administration

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants Reporting Serious Adverse Events
primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of informed consent up to approximately 3 months

secondary_outcome.measure: Geometric Mean Fold Rise (GMFR) of Anti-RSV Specific Neutralizing Activity
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 29 and Day 57 post-dose and at the time of discontinuation (whichever occurs first), up to approximately 2 months

secondary_outcome.measure: Geometric Mean Titer (GMT) of Anti-VAGA-9001a IgG
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 (pre-dose), Day 29 and Day 57 post-dose, and at the time of discontinuation (whichever occurs first), up to approximately 2 months

secondary_outcome.measure: Geometric Mean Titer (GMT) of Anti-RSV IgG
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 (pre-dose), Day 29 and Day 57 post-dose, and at the time of discontinuation (whichever occurs first), up to approximately 2 months

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of IFN-γ spot-forming cells in PBMC Detected by ELISPOT
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 (pre-dose), Day 29 and Day 57 post-dose, and at the time of discontinuation (whichever occurs first), up to approximately 2 months

arm_group.description: Healthy adults subjects will be randomized to receive intramuscular injection of low dose of VAGA-9001a adjuvanted with low dose of MABH-9002b.
Healthy adults subjects will be randomized to receive intramuscular injection of medium dose of VAGA-9001a adjuvanted with medium dose of MABH-9002b.
Healthy adults subjects will be randomized to receive intramuscular injection of high dose of VAGA-9001a adjuvanted with high dose of MABH-9002b.
Healthy adults and elderly subjects will be randomized to receive intramuscular injection of placebo.
Healthy elderly subjects will be randomized to receive intramuscular injection of low dose of VAGA-9001a adjuvanted with low dose of MABH-9002b.
Healthy elderly subjects will be randomized to receive intramuscular injection of medium dose of VAGA-9001a adjuvanted with medium dose of MABH-9002b.
Healthy elderly subjects will be randomized to receive intramuscular injection of high dose of VAGA-9001a adjuvanted with high dose of MABH-9002b.
Healthy adults and elderly subjects will be randomized to receive intramuscular injection of placebo.

intervention.description: VN-0200 (antigen: VAGA-9001a, adjuvant: MABH-9002b) administered as an intramuscular injection into the deltoid muscle of the upper arm; 2 injections total
Placebo administered as an intramuscular injection into the deltoid muscle of the upper arm; 2 injections total

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Japanese
- Healthy adults aged ≥20 and ≤50 years (Step 1) or healthy elderly aged ≥65 and ≤80 years (at the time of informed consent)
- Body mass index (BMI) is ≥18.0 and <30.0 kg/m^2 (at screening)
Exclusion Criteria:
- Participants with a history of anaphylaxis or severe allergies due to food, medicine, insect bites, cosmetics, or vaccination
- Having alcohol or drug dependence, etc.

facility.name: Medical Corporation Association Shinanokai Shinanozaka Clinic
